scripts.copy-libs: npm run ensure-dirs && npm run copy-pizzip && npm run copy-docxtemplater
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run copy-libs
scripts.copy-libs-windows: npm run ensure-dirs-windows && npm run copy-pizzip-windows && npm run copy-docxtemplater-windows
scripts.ensure-dirs-windows: if not exist "wwwroot\lib\pizzip" mkdir "wwwroot\lib\pizzip" && if not exist "wwwroot\lib\docxtemplater" mkdir "wwwroot\lib\docxtemplater"
scripts.postinstall: npm run copy-libs || npm run copy-libs-windows
